verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David; for a memorial.) O God, <S%H430><s%> [hasten <S%H2363><s%>] to deliver <S%H5337><s%> me; O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> hasten to my help! <S%H5833><s%>

Let those be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and humiliated <S%H2659><s%> Who seek <S%H1245><s%> my life; <S%H5315><s%> Let those be turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> and dishonored <S%H3637><s%> Who delight <S%H2655><s%> in my hurt. <S%H9567><s%>
Let those be turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> Who say, <S%H559><s%> "Aha, <S%H1889><s%> aha! <S%H1889><s%>"

Let all <S%H3605><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> Thee rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Thee; And let those who love <S%H157><s%> Thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> say <S%H559><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> "Let God <S%H430><s%> be magnified. <S%H1431><s%>"

But I am afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and needy; <S%H34><s%> Hasten <S%H2363><s%> to me, O God! <S%H430><s%> Thou art my help <S%H5828><s%> and my deliverer; <S%H6403><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> do not delay. <S%H309><s%>
